contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 28, 2018 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Fourth Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) preston-contest-fourth-section
World Tour
Guild Hall (Charter Theatre), Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Test piece can be World Tour or Second Suite in F (Gustav Holst). All bands chose World Tour. Best Soloist: Cornet, Lostock Hall Memorial Best Euphonium: Si Crowley, Rode Hall Silver Best Bass Section: Lostock Hall Memorial Youngest Player: Matthew Hurst, aged 11
Sept. 23, 2017, 11:14 a.m. Feb. 13, 2018, 5:40 p.m.
1 Lostock Hall Memorial Band Joshua Hughes
2 Blackley Band Adrian Smith
3 Rode Hall Silver Band Nigel Butler
4 Stacksteads Brass Band Fred Bowker
5 Brindle Band Keith Richmond
6 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Alan Seymour
